column4: A unresolvable problem occurred while initializing the package information.
Please report this bug against the 'update-manager' package and include the following error message:
'E:Type 'potitos)' is not known on line 61 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list, E:The list of sources could not be read.'
when I go into update manager this happens:could not innitialize package information
Could not initialize the package information
A unresolvable problem occurred while initializing the package information.
Please report this bug against the 'update-manager' package and include the following error message:
'E:Type 'potitos)' is not known on line 61 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list, E:The list of sources could not be read.'
You have added a bad source
gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list            and stick it in the pastebin
Put a # at the front of lines 59, 60 and 61  and save the file  then sudo apt-get update
